title: Order Business Cards
summary: Request and customize business cards with company branding and contact information
prompt: Create a business card ordering page with a form for customizing card details including name, title, department, contact information, and design template selection. Show a live preview card displaying the selected design and entered information. Include quantity selection, delivery address fields, and rush order options. Add a table of previous orders with columns for Date, Design, Quantity, Status, and Delivery badges. Include primary 'Place Order' and secondary 'Save Draft' buttons.
